sentences.sContent: The British were not prepared to make any concessions .
sentences.sCn: 英国人没有打算作出让步。

phrases.pCn: 特许经营权合约；租让制合同

remMethod.val: con(共同) + cess(行走， 前进) + ion → 要想大家共同进步， 必须都做出让步 → 让步

trans.tranCn: 让步， 迁就； 特许权； 承认， 认可
trans.tranOther: something that you allow someone to have in order to end an argument or a disagreement
